    • Uses of OTReceiver in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulation

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulation that implement OTReceiver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTFullSimDDHOnByteArrayReceiver
      Concrete implementation of the receiver side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation.
      class  OTFullSimDDHOnGroupElementReceiver
      Concrete implementation of the receiver side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation.

    • Uses of OTReceiver in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulationROM

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.fullSimulationROM that implement OTReceiver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTFullSimROMDDHOnByteArrayReceiver
      Concrete implementation of the receiver side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation in the random oracle model.
      class  OTFullSimROMDDHOnGroupElementReceiver
      Concrete implementation of the receiver side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves full simulation in the random oracle model.

    • Uses of OTReceiver in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.oneSidedSimulation

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.oneSidedSimulation that implement OTReceiver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTOneSidedSimDDHOnByteArrayReceiver
      Concrete implementation of the receiver side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves privacy for the case that the sender is corrupted and simulation in the case that the receiver is corrupted.
      class  OTOneSidedSimDDHOnGroupElementReceiver
      Concrete implementation of the receiver side in oblivious transfer based on the DDH assumption that achieves privacy for the case that the sender is corrupted and simulation in the case that the receiver is corrupted.

    • Uses of OTReceiver in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.privacyOnly

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.privacyOnly that implement OTReceiver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTPrivacyOnlyDDHOnByteArrayReceiver
      Concrete class for OT Privacy assuming DDH receiver ON BYTE ARRAY.
      class  OTPrivacyOnlyDDHOnGroupElementReceiver
      Concrete class for OT Privacy assuming DDH receiver ON GROUP ELEMENT.

    • Uses of OTReceiver in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.semiHonest

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.semiHonest that implement OTReceiver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTSemiHonestDDHOnByteArrayReceiver
      Concrete class for Semi-Honest OT assuming DDH receiver ON BYTE ARRAY.
      class  OTSemiHonestDDHOnGroupElementReceiver
      Concrete class for Semi-Honest OT assuming DDH receiver ON GROUP ELEMENT.

    • Uses of OTReceiver in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.uc

      Classes in edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.ot.uc that implement OTReceiver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OTUCDDHOnByteArrayReceiver
      Concrete class for OT receiver based on the DDH assumption that achieves UC security in the common reference string model.
      class  OTUCDDHOnGroupElementReceiver
      Concrete class for OT receiver based on the DDH assumption that achieves UC security in the common reference string model.
